EmailTemplate.name: AP Last Mile - Attempted delivery
EmailTemplate.subject: Good news! Your delivery will soon be ready to collect on case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery will soon be ready to collect
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are delighted to see that it has now been located and has had an attempted delivery today.
Your delivery will be dropped off at the end of the driver's run – after 4pm at Brisbane GPO. Please wait for your tracking to update with “awaiting collection” to know [when and where] it’s ready for you [to pick up].
Brisbane GPO can be found at 261 Queen Street, BRISBANE CITY, QLD, 4000 and you have 10 business days to collect your parcel. Brisbane GPO is also open 6:15am-5pm for parcel collection via hatch. Bring along some photo ID showing your name or the address matching the parcel, or find other ways to collect or to authorise someone else on your behalf.
Your case will be closed now that your delivery is almost there.
Australia Post
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
